attributes.action: make mountain rescue a full time emergency service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To create a full time management centre for mountain rescue or a subsection of the police/fire/ambulance call centres, with people trained and knowledgable answering the calls. Over the winter MR teams have helped more than usual with people getting stranded and such like so it is time that they are recognised for the work they do and get paid a proper salary rather than relying on volunteers.
